alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Washington; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:48PM EDT until July 06 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL MERCER...SOUTHERN WOODFORD...JESSAMINE AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 448 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Versailles to 10 miles west of Harrodsburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Versailles around 455 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Nicholasville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
